title: Schema for Executing NodeJS apps directly from TypeScript source files

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

tsConfig.description: The name of the Typescript configuration file.

preferTs.description: for each .js file (that is not in node_modules) will try to check if corresponding .ts version exists and require it

ignoreWatch.description: files/folders to be ignored by node-dev

debounce.decription: Debounce file change events (ms, non-polling mode)

watch.description: Explicitly add files or folders to watch and restart on change

host.description: The host to inspect the process on

port.description: The port to inspect the process on. Setting port to 0 will assign random free ports to all forked processes.
